articles.title: Weekly Horoscopes for the Week of June 27 by the Cut - The Cut
articles.description: Early Tuesday morning, Neptune retrograde begins. For better or for worse, you’ll have to reckon with the world as it actually is.
articles.content: Early Tuesday morning, Neptune retrograde begins. For the next five months, the planet of dreams will lose some of its usual power, and as it does, your fantasies will lose some of their hold on you.… [+8403 chars]
